job_description: Software Engineer - Entry level - Remote - Only Masters - job post SoftSages Technology Inc Chicago, IL • Remote $64,597 - $75,711 a year -  Full-time, Part-time, Temporary, Internship Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary $64,597 - $75,711 a year Job Type Full-time Part-time Temporary Internship Job description Software Engineer - Entry level Location - Fully Remote Duration: Intern to Full time Java Full Stack Developer DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: · Determine user requirements and specifications and plan for software development within the broader organizational scope. Software development includes end-user, system level, and data management applications. · Formulate detailed plans for the implementation of software solutions. In addition to program design this includes determining language, platform, and resource requirements. · Implementation of design including coding, testing, and documentation. · Deployment of applications across the enterprise including cross-platform compliance and insuring the availability of necessary resources. · Code maintenance including debugging and updating to keep pace with the evolving environment. · Assist in planning for future applications based on new developments in computer technology · Communicate with the software developer group, with users, and with management as well as with the wider community. · Maintain the strict confidentiality of sensitive information. · Perform other duties as assigned. · Responsible for observing all laws, regulations and other applicable obligations wherever and whenever business is conducted on behalf of the Company. · Expected to work in a safe manner in accordance with established operating procedures and practices. What is required? · Some prior IT experience is good and strong academic record is needed, you must be a good learner willing to learn and work on the latest technologies. · Strong knowledge of Java and full-stack development (Java plus Angular) with relational and non-relational DB experience. · Experience building multi-threaded applications using JMS/executor framework. · Experience or Strong knowledge of Angular js, React, Node, Redux. · Available for relocation once confirmed as full time. Highly Desire: · Angular, React, Node, Redux We provide: · We are an E-Verified Company eligible to Offer STEM Extension to those who join. · H1B processing of qualified candidates. · Earn while you learn so it will be a win situation in every aspect. Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Internship, Temporary Salary: $64,597.00 - $75,711.00 per year Benefits: Employee assistance program Relocation assistance Schedule: 8 hour shift Monday to Friday Education: Master's (Preferred) Experience: Angular: 1 year (Preferred) Java: 1 year (Preferred) Work Location: One location If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
